title: Just a dream ?
text: Lucas has a dream where he visits an administrative building. The building is mostly empty, but he finds a closet in which there's a huge set of machinery.
No idea what the machine does, but he tries to grab one of the components, leading the machanisms to violently block and start shooting pieces in all directions.

title: Restam Décarie
text: Morkez va faire une mauvaise joke à Restam, genre 'Ouais mais ta mère est morte !' Restam va super mal le prendre, ça va mettre leur amitié en péril.
As a consequence, Restam will suddenly become really self-conscious about his mom's death.
